thread.title: LOCAL SPORTS ROUNDUP (Wednesday events): Reaghan Tripp scores twice as Westport soccer wins.
thread.title_full: LOCAL SPORTS ROUNDUP (Wednesday events): Reaghan Tripp scores twice as Westport soccer wins.

author: Herald News Staff
title: LOCAL SPORTS ROUNDUP (Wednesday events): Reaghan Tripp scores twice as Westport soccer wins.
text: LOCAL SPORTS ROUNDUP (Wednesday events): Reaghan Tripp scores twice as Westport soccer wins. Comment The Herald News, Fall River, MA By Herald News Staff Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 10:35 PM Updated at 10:38 PM Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 10:35 PM Updated at 10:38 PM Reaghan Tripp scored all three goals as Westport shut out Holbrook, 3-0 in girls’ soccer action Wednesday afternoon. Tripp had two early goals for the Cats, who held a 2-0 lead at the break. Ashlie Thatcher recorded her seventh shutout of the season for Westport (6-3-5), which plays at Holbrook on Thursday. Boys’ Soccer Bishop Connolly 6, Sacred Heart 0: Nate Chhim scored a pair of second-half goals as the Cougars improved to 12-1-1. JP Viveiros, Jon Aguiar and Ruben Faria all scored for Bishop Connolly in the first half as the Cougars held a 3-0 lead at the break. Sam Harstad rounded out the scoring. Holbrook 5, Westport 0: The Wildcats were blanked in this meeting, but have a chance to quickly rebound as they host Holbrook Thursday. Field Hockey Seekonk 6, Case 0: The Cardinals were blanked in this South Coast Conference contest. Women’s Soccer Massasoit 6, BCC 1: The Lady Bayhawks lost their season finale on Tuesday. The lone BCC goal was scored by Molly Dreher. By Herald News Staff The Herald News, Fall River, MA By Herald News Staff Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 10:35 PM Updated at 10:38 PM
